SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.nxp.id.jcopx
Class FIPS

java.lang.Object
  com.nxp.id.jcopx.FIPS

public class FIPS
extends java.lang.Object

FIPS is a JCOP proprietary extension for executing and checking FIPS self-tests by an applet, after power-up. The execution of FIPS self-tests is necessary for all FIPS approved algorithms when JCOP is in FIPS Mode. For each crypto algorithm a self-test has to be performed before any crypto algorithm is used. For algorithms which are not used at all, the self-test does not have to be performed. In case an algorithm is called without prior testing, JCOP will go mute and needs to be reset. The self-test of an algorithm can either be done automatically by the OS (OS configuration) or can be done by an applet using the interface of this class.

public static final short FIPS_SELFTESTS_RSA_PAIR_WISE_STRAIGHT_MASK

FIPS

Method Detail

runSelftests

public static void runSelftests(short testsToRun)
The execution of FIPS self-tests is necessary for all FIPS approved algorithms when JCOP is in FIPS Mode. For each crypto algorithm a self-test has to be performed before any crypto algorithm is used. For algorithms which are not used at all, the self-test does not have to be performed. In case an algorithm is called without prior testing, JCOP will go mute and needs to be reset. The self-test of an algorithm can either be done automatically by the OS (OS configuration) or can be done by an applet using this method.

Parameters:
testsToRun - encodes the algorithms to test. The value is constructed by creating a logical OR of the requested algorithms denoted in FIPS.FIPS_SELFTESTS_*

getSelftestResults

public static short getSelftestResults()
Returns the tested algorithms.

Returns:
value constructed by creating a logical OR of the executed algorithms denoted in FIPS.FIPS_SELFTESTS_*
